title: The Joys of Parenthood
description:
This week, the crew discusses how to find the humor in the ups and downs of parenting as Jillian discusses yet another “too famous” experience with Phoenix. They also explore all the various milk variations from macadamia to oat milk and break down the pros and the cons of each. And, Jillian counsels caller Natacha on protein shakes and how to drop the last 15 lbs! 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
